thread.section_title: OFX Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OFX | ofx.com | 2 of 105
thread.title: Roger Avery

author: Roger Avery
title: Roger Avery
text: I need to regularly transfer retirement money from Canada to the USA. The Canadian Banks (it may be Canadian Government rules) have even stricter rules than USA Banks to do this, which means you have to be actually in a branch to initiate each transfer, which is impractical if you do not live in Canada. OFX has a system for me to initiate a Direct Debit Transfer from their website (of any amount I want) to their account from my Canadian Bank Account and then OFX changes it to US Dollars at a very competitive rate and deposit it in my US Bank Account. Nothing easier !!!
